summary: Tested two new kickoff features: 1) Meeting History in Kickoff Details API - WORKING, 2) HR Auto-Notification on Kickoff Accept - WORKING. All 8 backend tests pass (100%). Frontend Meeting History tab verified with actual meeting data displayed.
critical_code_review_comments: Feature 1 (Meeting History): GET /api/kickoff-requests/{id}/details correctly returns meeting_history array, client_expectations_summary, key_commitments_summary, and total_meetings_held fields
Feature 2 (HR Notification): POST /api/kickoff-requests/{id}/accept returns hr_notified count and staffing_requirements array, and creates 'project_staffing_required' notifications for HR users
Frontend Meeting History tab displays full meeting chronology with MOM details, action items, client concerns, and commitments
MOM data includes: summary, key_decisions, discussion_points, next_steps, client_concerns, commitments_made fields
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_MH leads and meetings during backend testing for meeting history verification
context_for_next_testing_agent: Two new kickoff features fully verified: 1) Kickoff Details API returns full meeting_history with MOM data for consulting team context, 2) Kickoff Accept creates 'project_staffing_required' notifications for all HR users (hr_manager, hr_executive roles) with high priority. Frontend Meeting History tab shows meeting chronology, action items, and MOM details. Empty state handled gracefully when no meetings exist.

New Fields: meeting_history - Full chronological list of meetings with MOM
client_expectations_summary - Deduplicated client concerns from all meetings
Feature 1 - Meeting History in Kickoff D.Frontend: Meeting History tab in Kickoff Request Details dialog shows full meeting list with MOM details

New Response Fields: hr_notified - Count of HR users notified

Notification Details.recipients: All users with role hr_manager or hr_executive
